snippet: Eugene Kaspersky says his discovery of the Flame virus adds weight to his warnings of the grave dangers posed by governments that manufacture and release viruses on the Internet.
abstract: Russian computer security expert Eugene Kaspersky says his discovery of the Flame virus, which is afflicting computers in Iran and the Middle East, adds weight to his warnings of the grave dangers posed by governments that manufacture and release viruses on the Internet.

byline.original: By ANDREW E. KRAMER and NICOLE PERLROTH
byline.contributor: Andrew E. Kramer reported from Moscow and Nicole Perlroth from San Francisco.

lead_paragraph: Eugene Kaspersky says his discovery of the Flame virus adds weight to his warnings of the grave dangers posed by governments that manufacture and release viruses on the Internet.

headline.seo: Cyberweapon Warning From Kaspersky, a Computer Security Expert
